name: Università Anglo Cattolica San Paolo Apostolo
memberOrga: Faculty, researchers, staff, managers, volunteers, students
goal:
international universities and scientific research center that cooperates with many other universities and colleges around the world

UNISANPAOLO is a Federal structure University very active in the dialogue between peoples and is participating States to join the initiative leading to the integration of crisitani and Muslims that has already affected more than 3 million people in Italy, we are in close contact with embassies and cooperating with the center of the Palestinian sutidi of Haifa, with the University of Benghazi in Libya, we are cooperating with the University of Moscow and one in Kiev and we have established a channel of dialogue between Russians and Ukrainians, with LUEMAH University, University of Wales and many other University in the World.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: many our teachers and researchers are responsible for the dissemination of European directives and regulations in many specific fields and have specific courses for the dissemination of European culture positive
